name: WARDUDES (itch)
description:
WARDUDES is an online party game where you play as an heir trying to get your "rightful" place on the throne. This is achieved by hectically running around and recruiting troops around the map which you then place onto a battlefield. your troops will duke it out with your opponents placed troops in a simulated battle and the last standing team will get closer to their title as supreme leader.

Creators:

Erikas Klesciovas, Martin Löfström, Emil Samuelsson, Simon Bäckström & Andri Anwar.
